analysis.description:
MatreXaCrowdsale.MatreXaCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc8d10a267c3ab4f3f00903d7fb4c22de005a6dc.sol#545-579) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-mtrx.mint(owner,_ownerTokens) (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc8d10a267c3ab4f3f00903d7fb4c22de005a6dc.sol#579)

MatreXaCrowdsale.fallback (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc8d10a267c3ab4f3f00903d7fb4c22de005a6dc.sol#601-619) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-mtrx.mint(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc8d10a267c3ab4f3f00903d7fb4c22de005a6dc.sol#615)
